dmca.title: Copyright Complaint
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ben Wilson [mailto:ben@remilon.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 16, 2007 1:56 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: 'Ben Wilson'; adrian@remilon.com
Subject: Copyright Complaint

 

Copyright Complaint 

 

Dear Copyright Complaint Department,

 

I am responsible for the copyright enforcement for 
www.efinancedirectory.com <http://www.efinancedirectory.com/> . I found
serious copyright violations from a site you appear to be hosting 
http://www.financepiazza.com/. All of the content (including the site
design) displayed on financepiazza.com was stolen from
efinacedirectory.com. This is a very serious matter and we expect you to
immediately enforce our copyright complaint by shutting down
www.financepiazza.com or we will escalate this issue with legal action.

 

 

1. Supporting Evidence of Copyright Infringement:

 

A.  There are thousands of pages that financepiazza.com has stolen from
efinancedirectory.com.  Below is a short list of examples that
illustrate this.  Compare the following pairs of pages and the article
pages they link to.  It is very clear that the content was stolen.

 

http://efinancedirectory.com/article_directory/Auto_Insurance_Guide.html


http://www.financepiazza.com/article_directory/Auto_Insurance_Guide.html

 

http://efinancedirectory.com/article_directory/Business_Loans_Guide.html

http://www.financepiazza.com/article_directory/Business_Loans_Guide.html

 

http://efinancedirectory.com/article_directory/index.html

http://www.financepiazza.com/article_directory/index.html

 

 

B. According to the WHOIS, financepiazza.com was created on 3/4/2007.
Our site, efinancedirectory.com was created almost two years earlier on
4/29/05.  If you look at the WayBackMachine Internet Archives 
http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://efinancedirectory.com
<http://web.archive.org/web/*/http:/efinancedirectory.com>  you will see
that we created and displayed all that content on efinancedirectory.com
long before financepiazza.com even existed.

 

2. Below is the DNS and WHOIS information we found for financepiazza.com

shell> traceroute financepiazza.com

traceroute to financepiazza.com (67.15.48.32), 64 hops max, 40 byte
packets

1   (192.168.123.254)  1.491 ms  0.771 ms  0.709 ms

2  bras18-l0.pltnca.sbcglobal.net (151.164.184.85)  11.396 ms  16.017 ms
12.159 ms

3  dist2-vlan50.pltn13.pbi.net (64.164.97.67)  9.335 ms  8.895 ms   

9.238 ms

8.680 ms

10.568 ms

10.487 ms  9.897 ms

56.041 ms  56.306 ms

57.048 ms

12  t289.216-200-251-170.iah1.us.above.net (216.200.251.170)  50.439 ms
50.605 ms  50.851 ms

13  gphou-66-98-241-29.ev1servers.net (66.98.241.29)  53.600 ms   

50.496 ms  50.210 ms

14  gphou-66-98-241-126.ev1servers.net (66.98.241.126)  50.587 ms   

50.756 ms  51.757 ms

15  *^C

 

shell> host financepiazza.com

financepiazza.com has address 67.15.48.32 financepiazza.com mail is
handled by 10 eforward1.name-services.com

5. Formal Declaration
===================
I hereby state that Remilon, LLC is the owner of the exclusive rights
referenced above and that I am authorized to act on its behalf. On
behalf of Remilon, LLC, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief
that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorized by
[Remilon, LLC], its agents, or the law. 

I, Ben Wilson, hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty
of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the
additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in
the notice is accurate.

 

 

---------------------------------------

Ben Wilson
